author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mahila Court judge Vijayakumar has sentenced a 24-year-old youth 10 years’ rigorous imprisonment for harassing wife that led to her committing suicide in 2013.

Harassment

The prosecution case was that G. Selvam used to harass wife S. Siva Sathiya (14) after they got married without informing their parents.

On March 30, 2013, Siva Sathiya committed suicide at her residence by hanging.

Complaint

Based on a complaint from the girl’s father T. Ezhumalai (45), the police registered a case against Selvam under Section 174 (iii) of CrPC (hanging) and Section 306 (abetment of suicide) of IPC.

The judge also imposed a fine of Rs. 1,000 on Vijayakumar.
title: Man gets RI for wife’s death
